parameters.name: mask

param_schema.title: Mask
param_schema.description: Black and white image to use as mask for inpainting over init_image. Black pixels are inpainted and white pixels are preserved. Tends to work better with prompt strength of 0.5-0.7. Consider using https://replicate.com/andreasjansson/stable-diffusion-inpainting instead.

parameters.description: Black and white image to use as mask for inpainting over init_image. Black pixels are inpainted and white pixels are preserved. Tends to work better with prompt strength of 0.5-0.7. Consider using https://replicate.com/andreasjansson/stable-diffusion-inpainting instead.

parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: width

param_schema.description: Width of output image. Maximum size is 1024x768 or 768x1024 because of memory limits

parameters.description: Width of output image. Maximum size is 1024x768 or 768x1024 because of memory limits

parameters.name: height

param_schema.description: Height of output image. Maximum size is 1024x768 or 768x1024 because of memory limits

parameters.description: Height of output image. Maximum size is 1024x768 or 768x1024 because of memory limits

parameters.name: scheduler

param_schema.description: Choose a scheduler. If you use an init image, PNDM will be used

parameters.description: Choose a scheduler. If you use an init image, PNDM will be used

parameters.name: init_image

param_schema.title: Init Image
param_schema.description: Inital image to generate variations of. Will be resized to the specified width and height

parameters.description: Inital image to generate variations of. Will be resized to the specified width and height

parameters.name: num_outputs

param_schema.title: Num Outputs
param_schema.description: Number of images to output. If the NSFW filter is triggered, you may get fewer outputs than this.

parameters.description: Number of images to output. If the NSFW filter is triggered, you may get fewer outputs than this.

parameters.name: prompt_strength

param_schema.title: Prompt Strength
param_schema.description: Prompt strength when using init image. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in init image

parameters.description: Prompt strength when using init image. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in init image

seed.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

init_image.description: Inital image to generate variations of. Will be resized to the specified width and height

num_outputs.description: Number of images to output. If the NSFW filter is triggered, you may get fewer outputs than this.

prompt_strength.description: Prompt strength when using init image. 1.0 corresponds to full destruction of information in init image
